order.bgnAmount: Amount of BGN you would like to spend
order.bchAmount: Estimated amount of BCH you will receive
order.termAndConditions: I agree to the Terms & Conditions and Privacy Policy.
order.exchangeRateTerms: I understand the exchange rate is recalculated at the time of payment.
header.heading: BuyBCH powered by POYPE
footer.footer: Provided by | Company number: {number} | Email: {email} | Phone: {phone}
currentOrder.amount: You are buying BCH for BGN {amount}
currentOrder.confirmation: Are you sure you would like to start again? This will reset the whole progress.
photo.typeId: Upload a photo of your ID in png or jpeg format.
photo.typeFace: Upload a selfie showing your face in png or jpeg format.
photo.typeDeclaration1: Print out and fill the Origin of Funds declaration form and upload a scanned copy in png or jpeg format.
photo.typeDeclaration2: Print out and fill the Affiliation declaration form and upload a scanned copy in png or jpeg format.
bchapi.error.getRate: Unable to retrieve exchange rate. Please try again later or contact support.
bchapi.error.badRequest: Incorrect data entered. Please correct and try again. ({errorMessage})
bchapi.error.notEnoughBch: Insufficient BCH amount to fulfill the order. Please decrease the amount or try again later.
bchapi.error.phoneNumber: Phone number is invalid. Use the following format: +359888123456.
bchapi.error.validationCode: Invalid validation code. Please try again.
bchapi.error.photoFormat: The photo format is not supported. Upload photo in png or jpeg format.
